text: aur hamane manushyon ko apane maan-baap ke saath achchha vyavahaar karane kee taakeed kee hai. kintu yadi ve tumapar zor daalen ki too kisee aisee cheez ko mera saakshee thaharae, jisaka tujhe koee gyaan nahin, to unakee baat na maan. meree hee or tum sabako palatakar aana hai, phir main tumhen bata doonga jo kuchh kum karate rahe hoge
